    How to use the `tinyForestR` package

Function reference

All functions

calc_bd_metrics()
calculate seasonal bd metrics
calc_ndvi_buff()
Calculate normalized difference vegetation index (NDVI) within a buffer around a point location
create_species_matrix()
Create a species matrix from a dataframe
get_bsbi_data()
Retrieves BSBI( Botanical Society of Britain and Ireland) data for a given grid reference
get_nbn_buffer()
Retrieves occurrence data from NBN Atlas within a specified buffer around given longitude and latitude
get_ndvi_time_series()
Get NDVI time series
get_phylopic_image()
Get PhyloPic Image
get_tf_data()
Retrieves and formats data from the Tiny Forest Earthwatch website
get_water_features()
Get Natural Water Features
initialise_tf()
Initialize TinyForest package virtual environment
os_lat_lon_to_grid()
Convert Latitude and Longitude to Ordnance Survey Grid Reference
plot_os_land_cover()
Plot OS Land Cover
save_ggmap_images()
Save ggmap Images
tf_data tf_data
Tiny Forest (TF) data
